item.title: By: Charles McKeever

item.description: Sounds good Jay. Let me know when you're ready and we'll set a date :)

item.title: By: J. A. Whye
item.dc:creator: J. A. Whye
item.description:
Thanks for mentioning Desperado. It may turn out that only me and two other people will care about it, but since I firmly believe it's a better way to code (as in easier and more productive) I'll continue working on it. :)
I'm going to do an open alpha starting next week -- after that's available I'd love to come on to the show and talk about why every IDE should switch from the dark side. ;)
Jay
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for mentioning Desperado. It may turn out that only me and two other people will care about it, but since I firmly believe it’s a better way to code (as in easier and more productive) I’ll continue working on it. ðŸ™‚

I’m going to do an open alpha starting next week — after that’s available I’d love to come on to the show and talk about why every IDE should switch from the dark side. ðŸ˜‰
